entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
